text: 5.3 Apo 5.41, 2 Ko 12.10, Plp 2.17, Jem 1.2-3, 1 Pi 1.5-7, 3.14 Chɨn pen anɨb ak nep ma mɨñmɨñ gɨpun. Binɨb okok chɨnop gɨ tɨmel gel yul awl dɨpun ak, ak abe nɨgon chɨnop tep gup. Taynen gos anɨb ak nopun? Anɨgɨl mɨdeb. Chɨnop gɨ tɨmel gel yul awl dɨpun won ak, chɨnop gek kɨles tɨmel gɨl jak mɨdɨl mɨŋel okok dɨpun.
